sect1.title: Testing Web:Extend
sect1.para: The most immediate contribution anyone can make is by running the test suite on all environments they have available. The test suite will run without any configuration required, but will skip a large amount of tests if extensions aren't available. No need to worry about the ones you don't need though. The only thing you'll want to setup is the database that will be used for the database tests. To do so, just create a database named wee_tests and a user named wee with a password wee and give it full access to the wee_tests database.

If all tests pass, then it's all good! Feel free to tell us it worked for you. If it didn't though, you should submit a bug report to our issue tracker or send us an email at wee-users@googlegroups.com.

sect1.title: Reporting bugs
sect1.para: Feedback is the most important contribution you can make to the project. A good bug report includes an explanation of what you tried to achieve along with the error encountered. The error can be obtained by repeating the action with DEBUG mode enabled. This usually is more than enough for us to resolve the bug. In the case that this isn't enough and that we need to contact you, it is best that you also provide an email address where we can join you.

We currently use the github issue tracking system. This is not a perfect solution, but until we have one that's what we'll be using. If you don't want to register an account just to report a bug, you can simply send an email at wee-users@googlegroups.com.

sect1.title: Contributing source code
sect1.para: All source code contributions are welcome. If you wish to add a feature to the framework, contact us first in case we already had plans. Patches can be sent directly to the issue tracking system or to wee-users@googlegroups.com.
Later you will be able to create and manage your own addons. If you plan to do so in the future, you can contact us and work with us to setup the best addons manager for your purpose.

sect1.title: Improving the documentation
sect1.para: You can improve the documentation in various ways. The simplest way is by sending us your feedback along with suggestions, by email to wee-users@googlegroups.com. We are interested in any kind of feedback.
You can also contribute new material to the guide, by writing a new chapter or improving an existing one. It is best that you contact us before starting though, to avoid duplicating efforts.
Finally you can write tutorials or tips on your own and send us the links; we will display them on the documentation page along with the official documentation.
The documentation can also be translated.

sect1.title: Translating Web:Extend
sect1.para: Considering the framework is still in beta, we have no plans to translate the framework or this guide just yet. But since we will at some point, you should contact us if you are interested. Note that right now everything could change and it could become more work than for a stable release. If you are interested in translating Web:Extend eventually, contact us by email at wee-users@googlegroups.com.
